game.name: One Minute
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 광란의 혼돈 속으로 뛰어들어라! One Minute, 빠르고 중독성 있는 로그라이트! 다양한 미니게임을 잠금 해제하고, 커서 스킨을 수집하며, 점수를 향상시켜 글로벌 리더보드에서 빛나라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into a frenetic chaos with One Minute, a fast and addictive roguelite! Unlock varied mini-games, collect cursor skins, and improve your scores to shine in the global leaderboard.

reviewHighlights.text: Like a mix of WarioWare microgames and those incremental clickers, this had me addicted for hours. You can probably unlock all upgrades within two hou...
